variants.title: Ambient Monitor Variants
variants.description: Prana Airs ambient air quality monitoring devices are where your search stops.

ambientPM.title: Ambient PM
ambientPM.description: It is the basic ambient monitor that measures AQI, PM2.5, PM10, temperature, and humidity providing a comprehensive overview of the air quality around you.

portable.title: Portable and easy to carry anywhere

ambientPM.detailsDescription: Prana Air Ambient PM Basic Monitor is a comprehensive solution for measuring air quality. It accurately measures PM2.5, PM10, temperature, and humidity, providing you with valuable insights into the air you breathe. With an optional weather station, you can also gain data on wind speed, wind direction, rainfall, and barometric pressure. The compact and portable design of the Prana Air Ambient PM Basic Monitor makes it easy to use anywhere. The clear and easy-to-read screen displays real-time data, and built-in data logging allows you to track trends over time. Cloud connectivity provides remote access to data, so you can stay informed about air quality even when youe not on site.
ambientPM.detailsImageAlt: prana air ambient air quality monitor for constructions site

pranaSense.title: Prana Sense
pranaSense.description: Revolutionizing Air Quality Monitoring with cutting-edge technology for better accuracy and reliability with seamless connectivity and comprehensive data access.
pranaSense.detailsDescription: Prana Sense offers the ultimate solution for continuous, real-time outdoor air quality monitoring. Monitor several parameters and pollutants with the advanced technology of the device. Connect the device with a solar panel for continuous power supply with a 40,000 mAh battery that can last long for 96 hours. The compact and portable design of the monitor makes it easy to install anywhere. Also provide real-time readings of temperature, humidity and noise for perfect environmental monitoring. Seamlessly connect to the AQI app or cloud storage to access your data from anywhere, anytime.
pranaSense.detailsImageAlt: prana air ambient pro air quality monitor in used

ambientPro.title: Ambient Pro
ambientPro.description: It is the most advanced monitor in Prana Airs Ambient family. It measures all of the same pollutants as the Ambient Lite monitor, plus temperature and humidity.

dataAccess.title: Data on website, mobile & table apps, TV

weatherStation.title: Ambient Pro Monitor
weatherStation.description: It is the most advanced ambient air quality monitor of Prana Air that comes with inbuilt weather station.

ambientPro.detailsDescription: The primary aspect for determining environmental stability is the Continuous Ambient Air Quality Monitoring System (CAAQMS). There are many factors that control the quality of air and many sources contributing to it such as natural, industrial and anthropogenic. Meteorological factors also alter and impact air quality. Outdoor air pollution does not just jeopardize the living. It is also detrimental to the ecology and the atmospheric chemistry of the earth. Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) and asthma are examples of bad air quality for human health.

items.title: Construction Site
items.description: Construction sites are a major source of dust and other pollutants. Prana Air can help construction sites to monitor their air quality levels and take steps to reduce emissions.
items.alt: Prana Air construction site air quality monitor

items.title: Parking Lots
items.description: Parking lots are a major source of vehicle emissions. Our solution can help parking lot operators to monitor their air quality levels and take steps to reduce emissions.
items.alt: Prana Air parking lot air quality monitor

items.title: Smart City Project
items.description: Smart city projects are increasingly incorporating air quality monitoring into their designs. Prana Airs ambient air quality solution can help smart city projects to monitor their air quality levels.
items.alt: Prana Air smart city air quality monitor

items.title: Real Estates
items.description: New real estate developments are often located in areas with poor air quality. Prana Airs solution can help real estate developers to identify areas with good air quality.
items.alt: Prana Air real estates air quality monitor

items.title: RMC Plant
items.description: Ready-mix concrete plants are a major source of air pollution, emitting particulate matter, dust, and other pollutants. Our solution can help RMC plants to monitor their air quality levels.
items.alt: Prana Air RMC air quality monitor

items.title: Airports
items.description: Airports are another major source of air pollution, emitting pollutants from aircraft, vehicles, and other sources. Prana Airs ambient air quality solution can help airports to monitor their air quality levels.
items.alt: Prana Air airport air quality monitor

ambientAirQuality.quote: Ambient Air Quality Monitoring is one of the primary aspects that govern environmental stability. Air quality is dynamic. Several factors control the air quality of a place. There are numerous natural, industrial, and anthropogenic sources that emit air toxins. Meteorological factors also alter and impact air quality. Outdoor air pollution does not just jeopardize the living. It is also detrimental to the ecology and the atmospheric chemistry of the earth. Thus, outdoor air monitoring is essential.

caaqms.title: Ambient Air Quality Monitoring Devices
caaqms.description1: Outdoor air quality monitoring is an integral part of environmental assessments. Proper air monitoring helps in the formulation of an efficient action plan to mitigate air pollution. Conventionally, the Continuous Ambient Air Quality Management System (CAAQMS) used for ambient air monitoring is a very extensive and expensive set-up. However, not only does our device exemplify efficiency, but it is also compact and cost-efficient.
caaqms.description2: The primary aspect for determining environmental stability is the Continuous Ambient Air Quality Monitoring System (CAAQMS). There are many factors that control the quality of air and many sources contributing to it such as natural, industrial and anthropogenic. Meteorological factors also alter and impact air quality. Outdoor air pollution does not just jeopardize the living. It is also detrimental to the ecology and the atmospheric chemistry of the earth. Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) and asthma are examples of bad air quality for human health. Thus, outdoor air monitoring is essential. Conventionally, the Continuous Ambient Air Quality Management System (CAAQMS) used for ambient air monitoring is a very extensive and expensive set-up as it involves regular filter changes, and importing regulations. Prana Air provides ambient air quality monitors that are easy to regulations. Prana Air provides ambient air quality monitors that are easy to use, portable, and highly accurate and cost-effective. The monitors come with detecting sensors for particulate matter, nitrogen dioxide, sulfur dioxide, hydrogen sulfide, carbon monoxide, and ozone based on different sensing techniques.
caaqms.description3: Using Continuous Ambient Air Quality Management System helps you to assess pollution extent, create awareness among the general public, decisions, and policymaking, and provides you with data for air quality model evaluation and emission control strategies.

values.0: PM10, PM2.5, SO2. NO2, O3, CO
values.8: Available on website, mobile & TV app

pranaAir.description: Ambient Air monitor is CAAQMS (Continuous Ambient Air Quality Monitoring System) installed with sensors to detect the concentration of pollutants like PM10, PM2.5, SO2. NO2, O3, H2S, NH3, CO, etc. Prana Air monitor is smart, economical, easy to use, portable, compact lightweight, and consumes very less time for analysis and has Wi-Fi, GSM, and RS-485 type connectivity. The data is shown on a digital screen and provides 24Ã—7 access to analytic results. The real-time data is given in less than 30 seconds with accuracy and precision.

traditional.description: (Continuous Ambient Air Quality Monitoring System) is very big in size comparable to a small room. The system has different analyzers for different parameters such as BAM for Particulate Matter, pulsed UV fluorescence for SO2, chemiluminescence for NO2 and NH3, NDIR (Non-Dispersive Infrared Technology) for CO2, and UV photometric/ chemiluminescence for O3 and gives real-time data within 20-25 minutes. The system is bulky & huge and hence its portability is restricted. It requires manpower and high maintenance cost.
traditional.imageAlt: traditional caaqms (Continuous Ambient Air Quality Monitoring System)

bamBanner.title: Beta Attenuation Mass (BAM) Monitor
bamBanner.description: Prana Airs high-end, but low-cost, accurate and reliable air quality monitoring system

0.question: 1. What parameters OxyCo does monitor?
0.answer: OxyCo is designed to monitor real-time Oxygen, carbon monoxide, temperature and humidity in your air.

1.question: 2. What is the battery capacity of the OxyCo?
1.answer: The compact monitor is packed with a 1000mAh battery that works for a long time.

2.question: 3. How can I access OxyCo data?
2.answer: You can seamlessly access the OxyCo data by downloading it in different formats or transferring it to your email.

3.question: 4. Why do Oxygen Calibration?
3.answer: The OxyCo monitor performs Oxygen Calibration to maintain optimal accuracy in the device readings.
